transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello. Ji ${Exec_Name} bol rahe hai.
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Haan ji. Gaurav aap this side from IndiaMART sir.
Customer: Bolye.
Executive: Kaise hai sir?
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello, voice aa raha hai?
Customer: Sir voice sahi aa raha hai. I said uh uh
Executive: 4 o'clock call karu sir? Aapko main kal call karu?
Customer: Haan kal karo.
Executive: Kis time kal call ho aapko sir? Uh
Customer: Kal subah evening evening kar do. Evening 4 o'clock ke baad.
Executive: Evening 4 o'clock. Aaj 4 o'clock pe kar lunga?
Customer: Haan chalega.
Executive: Theek hai. Aapne na not satisfied mark kiya tha na sir feedback aaya tha WhatsApp pe.
Customer: Haan ya ya ya.
Executive: Ji ji ji. Usi ke regarding call gaya tha.
Customer: Theek hai sir main ye nahi kar sakta. Aapko 4 baje call karu?
Customer: Haan 4 baje kar dijiye. Theek hai.
Executive: Okay sir.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer marked 'not satisfied' in feedback.



Resolution:

- Executive will call the customer at 4 PM.



Next Steps: 

None

Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Neutral -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- feedback, call, time
